content.icerik: Contains sea-moss extracts to reconstruct the skin by supplying energy, necessary for a healthy functioning of the cells. The synergy of active ingredients like Pepha-Tight, Pepha-Timp and Palmitoly Tripeptide-3 increase the skin elasticity, diminish the depth of fine lines and wrinkles by stimulating the collagen synthesis. Matrix-lift includes intense nourishing and moisturizing properties.The skin becomes more firm, smooth, distressed and luminous.Contains UVA + UVB filter.
